LIG.LS.long_name: Lisgráfica - Impressão e Artes Gráficas, S.A.
LIG.LS.summary: Lisgrafica-Impressao e Artes Graficas provides printing services in Europe and Central America. It prints magazines, newspapers, supplements, catalogs, brochures, and telephone directories. The company was founded in 1973 and is headquartered in Barcarena, Portugal. Lisgrafica-Impressao e Artes Graficas is a subsidiary of Rasografica Comercio e Servicos Graficos.

LIT.LS.summary: Litho Forma, S.A. provides solutions for packaging, ticketing, and communication. The company develops and produces labeling solutions for pharmaceutical, chemical and agrochemical, wines and drinks, food, cosmetics, paper, auto, machinery, and other industries. It also offers ticketing solutions for sporting and cultural events; and parking and access control solutions. In addition, the company develops point of sale communication products, such as posters, exhibitors, banners, and flyers; and provides development, personalization, and enveloping services for direct marketing campaigns and communication transactional information, such as invoices, account statements, and customer loyalty programs, as well as offers communication support, business cards, manuals, reports, and books services. Further, it is involved in printing and finishing media supports; and provides forms, envelopes and bags, data mailer, and auto mailer services, as well as catering wipes. The company was formerly known as Litho Formas Portuguesa SA and changed its name to Litho Forma, S.A. in June 2015.
